channel.title: Npc Talking and options
channel.description: I have added a lottery npc to my server and got a timed message to inform ppl what lottery pot is and got lottery in src-model-minigames.. when u talk to the npc and click "enter 3m to lottery" option .. it doesnt take the 3m from ur inventory and add it to lottery pot. how do i fix this?.. Also the wierd old man doesnt fix barrows , it doesnt let you even click the button. Please helppp

item.title: Npc Talking and options
item.dc:creator: @T0xicsnip3r T0xicsnip3r
item.description:
@T0xicsnip3r wrote:

na shock i dont think its in there , cuz my old source had lottery and i searched only thing in actionhandler is the player rights allowed to enter lottery

Read full topic
